description:
Crear la columna UniversityID en el índice 4 basada en la columna University usando la expresión grel:md5(
  value.trim()
       .toLowercase()
       .replace(/[áàäâ]/,"a")
       .replace(/[éèëê]/,"e")
       .replace(/[íìïî]/,"i")
       .replace(/[óòöô]/,"o")
       .replace(/[úùüû]/,"u")
       .replace(/[ÁÀÄÂ]/,"a")
       .replace(/[ÉÈËÊ]/,"e")
       .replace(/[ÍÌÏÎ]/,"i")
       .replace(/[ÓÒÖÔ]/,"o")
       .replace(/[ÚÙÜÛ]/,"u")
)

Transforma el texto de las celdas en la columna Academic Level usando la expresión grel:md5(
  value.trim()
       .toLowercase()
       .replace(/[áàäâ]/,"a")
       .replace(/[éèëê]/,"e")
       .replace(/[íìïî]/,"i")
       .replace(/[óòöô]/,"o")
       .replace(/[úùüû]/,"u")
       .replace(/[ÁÀÄÂ]/,"a")
       .replace(/[ÉÈËÊ]/,"e")
       .replace(/[ÍÌÏÎ]/,"i")
       .replace(/[ÓÒÖÔ]/,"o")
       .replace(/[ÚÙÜÛ]/,"u")
)

Transforma el texto de las celdas en la columna Ambit usando la expresión grel:md5(
  value.trim()
       .toLowercase()
       .replace(/[áàäâ]/,"a")
       .replace(/[éèëê]/,"e")
       .replace(/[íìïî]/,"i")
       .replace(/[óòöô]/,"o")
       .replace(/[úùüû]/,"u")
       .replace(/[ÁÀÄÂ]/,"a")
       .replace(/[ÉÈËÊ]/,"e")
       .replace(/[ÍÌÏÎ]/,"i")
       .replace(/[ÓÒÖÔ]/,"o")
       .replace(/[ÚÙÜÛ]/,"u")
)

Crear la columna DegreeID en el índice 3 basada en la columna Degree usando la expresión grel:md5(
  (coalesce(cells["University"].value,"") + coalesce(cells["Degree"].value,""))
    .trim()
    .toLowercase()
    .replaceChars(
      "áàäâéèëêíìïîóòöôúùüûÁÀÄÂÉÈËÊÍÌÏÎÓÒÖÔÚÙÜÛñÑçÇ",
      "aaaaeeeeiiiioooouuuuAAAAEEEEIIIIOOOOUUUUnNcC"
    )
)
Renombra la columna Academic Level a AcademicLevelId
Renombra la columna Ambit a AmbitId
